sections.title: The House Blend
sections.description: The core of who you are — your presence, your effort, and the way loving you feels natural and steady.
entries: You feel like someone who took the very best parts of the people I love most and somehow became your own incredible person, and even those comparisons fall unbelievably short of capturing everything I love about you.
From the moment we really started talking, I felt this — this sense that you were different in a way I couldn’t quite explain yet.
When we're cuddled up on the couch, there's this effortless sense of belonging, happiness, and comfort that didn’t take any effort to get to.
Being with you doesn't take effort — it just feels natural.
Even though I'm anxious and insecure, there are so many moments with you where I get to just sink into you and feel steady.
When you get soft and sink into my arms, there's this overwhelming feeling that you belong there.
You are never disingenuous — you are always 100% yourself, and I absolutely love that about you.
I love that you always try with me and put 100% of your effort into making me feel loved and cared for.
Sharing a kitchen with you feels so damn natural — I never get annoyed, I'm just happy you're there with me.
I think I'm always just genuinely happy to be spending time with you.
You make me a better person all the time, and I appreciate that more than you know.

sections.title: Brain Buzz
sections.description: All the ways your mind absolutely wrecks me — your intelligence, creativity, depth, and the way you teach and explain things.
entries: I genuinely think you are one of the smartest people I've ever met, and that still blows my mind.
Your thirst for knowledge feels like something that can never be fully satiated — you're always learning, always growing, always working on yourself.
You think things through before you speak, and you have refreshing thoughts I've honestly never heard from anyone else.
The way your brain processes things fascinates me, especially how quickly you can see through my bullshit.
You ask thoughtful questions that make conversations feel deeper, and your rants always make sense to me — even when you think they don't.
Watching you solve a Minute Cryptic ridiculously fast blows my mind every single time.
I love how good you are at design and work stuff — it's so attractive when you can clearly explain why something needs to be a certain way and why you want it done like that.
I love that you're patient with me and teach me how to do things, or how to see things differently.
I loved our conversation about the logos — that kind of thing makes me so happy.
I love how good you are at art, and that I can talk to you about creative things and get thoughtful feedback.
You got me into woodburning and made me feel excited about creating art again — something I hadn’t touched in years.

sections.title: Stubborn Spice
sections.description: Your drive, your standards, your vision — the way you know exactly what you want and refuse to give up.
entries: I love how stubborn you are — when you set your mind to something, you just do it.
You don’t stop trying, even when you have setbacks or you’re not feeling well, and I think that’s incredible.
Your determination is genuinely inspiring to me.
You're observant in ways most people aren't — you notice the little things and you're thoughtful in ways that feel rare.
I love how picky you are, because it means you know exactly what you want.
When you were decorating your room, you had a full vision in your head, knew EXACTLY what you were looking for, and then brought it to life.

sections.title: Soft Serve
sections.description: The tiny, specific, heart-melting moments that live permanently in my brain.
entries: I fucking loved watching you bop along to that electro swing song — that moment is permanently embedded in my brain.
Your random bursts of energy make me so happy, especially the specific little things that make you light up.
Your sass is elite and your comebacks are lightning fast — I absolutely love that about you.
The smile you give me when I do something you think is cute melts me every time.
Your voice is so soft and comforting — it brings me more comfort and joy than I can explain.
Being in your arms feels like coming home to a place I didn’t even know could exist.
I love that we got Polaroid cameras at the same time, and I love all the Polaroids we took together.
I love when we cuddle up in bed even though we're both dying from the heat and still just want to be close to each other.
I love when you wake me up after a bad nightmare so I can hold you and tell you everything is okay, or when you curl up into my back.

sections.title: Heart Rate Spike
sections.description: The part where I admit I think you're ridiculously attractive — especially in the ways that completely undo me.
entries: I genuinely think you are unbelievably attractive in every single way.
You look absolutely amazing — just as a general statement.
You're hot.
I really like your butt. It's a very good butt.
Your eyes are fucking beautiful — sometimes they’re sky blue and piercing and impossibly deep, sometimes the softest green, and sometimes grey that completely blows my mind.
I love that they’re always changing, that I can sink into them, and that they make me feel something different every day.
I really love holding your face and getting to connect with you in that way.
When you're climbing and you hit a move you didn't think you could get, that confidence is insanely attractive.
When you laugh at me for doing something stupid, it weirdly makes me so happy.
When you get soft and stubborn and decide what's best for me like I don't get a choice, I love that dynamic more than I should.

sections.title: Cat Approved
sections.description: Proof of character: the way you love the creatures I love.
entries: I love how much you love cats — yours and mine.
I love that you love Baast and always take the time to make her feel loved, heard, and cared for.
I love that you love the fact that you're good with cats.

sections.title: Cosmic Combo
sections.description: The us of it all — the way we fit, click, and feel bigger than coincidence.
entries: The way we complement each other intellectually feels rare, and our conversations click in a million different ways.
Our experiences are so different, yet when we talk, everything just makes sense.
You fill a void in my life I didn’t even know was empty.
I've met people who felt like the idea of soulmates before — but never like this.
I wish you could see yourself through my eyes for even a second, because I truly believe you are the best person I’ve ever met.
